widget.description: Describes a Widget which will represent this Node on the screen.

^.*$.description: Defines a child layout or Node.

children.description: Defines any Nodes which will be parented to this Node, keyed by their names.

pos.description: Defines the starting position of this Node. Defaults to (0, 0).

scale.description: Defines the scale of this Node. Defaults to (1, 1).

alpha.description: Defines the starting alpha (transparency) value of this Node. Defaults to 1 (fully opaque).
